Aztecs.civBonus:
- Villagers carry capacity +5 
 - All Military Units are created 15% faster 
 - Monks gain 5 HP for every tech researched at the Monastery 
 - Loom Tech free 
 - No Gunpowder or Cavalry Units 
 - Scout Cavalry is replaced by Eagle Scout
Aztecs.techs:
- Atlatl: Gives Skirmishers +1 attack and range 
 - Garland Wars: Increases Infantry attack by +4

Berbers.civBonus:
- Villagers move +10% faster 
 - Stable units cost -20% (starting in castle age) 
 - Ships move +10% faster
Berbers.techs:
- Kasbah: Team castles work +25% faster 
 - Maghrabi Camels: Camel troops regenerate
Berbers.units:
- Camel Archer (Cavalry Archer with bonus against Cavalry archers) 
 - Genitour (Mounted Skirmisher)

Britons.civBonus:
- Town Centers cost -50% Wood from the Castle Age 
 - Foot archers (except Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age, +1 in Imperial Age (+2 range total) 
 - Shepherds work 25% faster
Britons.techs:
- Yeomen: (+1) Range for Foot Archers, (+2) Attack for towers 
 - Warwolf: Gives Trebuchets blast damage and 100% accuracy against units

Bulgarians.civBonus:
- Militia-line upgrades free 
 - Town Centers const -50% stone 
 - Can build Krepost
Bulgarians.techs:
- Stirrups: Scout Cavalry-line and Konniks attack 25% faster 
 - Bagains: Militia-line gain +3 armor
Bulgarians.units: - Konnik (Cavalry that fights as infantry when felled)

Burmese.civBonus:
- Free Lumber Camp Upgrades 
 - Infantry +1 Attack per Age (Starting in Feudal Age) 
 - Monastery techs 50% cheaper
Burmese.teamBonus: - Relics are visible on the mini map
Burmese.techs:
- Howdah: Battle Elephants get +1/+2 armor 
 - Manipur Cavalry: Cavalry and Arambai get +6 attack versus buildings
Burmese.units: - Arambai {A powerful, but inaccurate Cavalry archer)

Byzantines.civBonus:
- Buildings gain +10% HPs in Dark Age, +20% Feudal Age, +30% Castle Age, +40% Imperial Age 
 - Camels, Skirmishers, Pikemen, Halberdiers are cost -25% 
 - Fire Ships +20% Attack 
 - Advance to Imp Age costs -33% (667 Food and 536 Gold instead of 1000 Food and 800 Gold) 
 - Town Watch Tech free
Byzantines.techs:
- Greek Fire: Gives Fire Ships +1 range 
 - Logistica: Cataphracts do trample damage

Celts.civBonus:
- Lumberjacks work 15% faster 
 - Infantry move 15% faster 
 - Siege weapons fire 20% faster 
 - Sheep cannot be converted if in 1 Celt Unit's line of sight
Celts.techs:
- Stronghold: Castles and towers fire 25% faster 
 - Furor Celtica: Siege Units have +40% HP

Chinese.civBonus:
- Start Game with 3 extra villagers but -200 Food and -50 Wood 
 - Town Center supports 10 population instead of 5 
 - Technologies cost -10% in Feudal Age, -15% Castle Age, -20% Imp Age 
 - Demolition Ships have +50% HP
Chinese.techs:
- Great Wall: Increases the hit points of walls and towers by +30% 
 - Rocketry: Chu Ko Nu (+2) attack, Scorpions (+4) attack

Cumans.civBonus:
- Additional Town Centers can be built in the Feudal Age 
 - Seige Workshop and Battering Ram availiable in the Feudal Age 
 - Cavalry 10% faster
Cumans.techs:
- Steppe Husbandry: Scout Calvalry-line trains 80% faster 
 - Cuman Mercenaries: team members can create 10 free Eliete Kipchaks in the Castle
Cumans.units: - Kipchak Archer (Cavalry archer with rapid-fire attack)

Ethiopians.civBonus:
- Archers move +15% faster 
 - Receive +100 gold, +100 food when advancing to the next age 
 - Pikemen and Halberdier upgrades free
Ethiopians.techs:
- Royal Heirs: Shotel Warriors are created nearly instantly 
 Torsion Engines: Siege workshop units blast radius increase
Ethiopians.units: - Shotel Warrior (Cheap, quick to build infantry)

Franks.civBonus:
- Castles cost -25% 
 - Cavalry +20% HP 
 - Farm upgrades free 
 - Foragers work 25% faster
Franks.techs:
- Chivalry: Increases the work rate of Stables by +40% 
 - Bearded Axe: (+1) Range for Throwing Axeman

Goths.civBonus:
- Infantry cost -35% starting in Feudal Age 
 - Infantry have +1 attack bonus vs buildings 
 - Villagers have +5 attack bonus vs boars 
 - (+10) population cap in Imperial Age 
 - Unable to build Stone Walls
Goths.techs:
- Anarchy: Huskarls can be created at Barracks 
 - Perfusion: Barracks create units 100% faster

Huns.civBonus:
- Don't need Houses, but start game with -100 wood 
 - Cavalry Archers cost -10% Castle Age, -20% Imperial 
 - Trebuchets +30% Accuracy
Huns.techs:
- Marauders: Allows the creation of Tarkans at the Stable 
 - Atheism: (+100) years for Relic & Wonder Victories, Spies/Treason cost -50%

Incas.civBonus:
- Start with a free llama 
 - Villagers affected by Blacksmith upgrades 
 - Houses support 10 population 
 - Buildings cost -15% stone 
 - Scout Cavalry is replaced by Eagle Scout
Incas.techs:
- Couriers: Eagle Warriors, Slingers and Kamayuks +1/+2 armor 
 - Andean Sling: Skirmishers and Slingers have no minimum range
Incas.units:
- Kamayuk (Infantry with a massive spear) 
 - Slinger (Anti-infantry archer)

Indians.civBonus:
- Villagers cost -10% Dark, -15% Feudal, -20% Castle, -25% Imperial 
 - Fishermen work 15% faster and carry +15 
 - Camels +1/+1 armor
Indians.techs:
- Sultans: All gold income +10% 
 - Shatagni: Hand Cannoneers get +1 Range
Indians.units:
- Elephant Archer (Archer riding an elephant) 
 - Imperial Camel (Upgrade for Heavy Camel)

Italians.civBonus:
- Advancing to next age costs -15% 
 - All dock techs cost -50% 
 - Fishing ship cost -15 wood 
 - Gunpowder units cost -25%
Italians.teamBonus: - Condottiero also available in allies' barracks in Imperial Age (once you have built a castle)
Italians.techs:
- Pavise: Foot Archers +1/+1 armor 
 - Silk Road: Trade units cost -50%
Italians.units:
- Genoese Crossbowman (Archer with bonus against Cavalry) 
 - Condottiero (Infantry with bonus against gunpowder units)

Japanese.civBonus:
- Fishing ships have x2 HP, +2 piercing armor, work rate +5% Dark, +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imperial 
 - Mills, Lumber/Mining Camps cost -50% 
 - Infantry attack 25% faster starting in Feudal Age
Japanese.techs:
- Yasama: Gives towers extra arrows 
 - Kataparuto: Trebuchets fire & pack faster
Japanese.units: - Samurai (Infantry Unit with Bonus against other Unique Units)

Khmer.civBonus:
- Prereq buildings aren't required to advance to further ages or unlock other buildings (i.e., a castle is not required to advance to the Imp age or a blacksmith is not required to build a siege workshop) 
 - Battle Elephants are +15% faster 
 - Villagers can garrison in Houses
Khmer.techs:
- Tusk Swords: Battle Elephants get +3 attack 
 - Double Crossbow: Ballista Elephants and Scorpions shoot two projectiles

Koreans.civBonus:
- Villagers have +3 LoS 
 - Stone Miners work 20% faster 
 - Tower Upgrades free (Chemistry still required for Bombard Tower) 
 - Towers Range +1 Castle Age, +2 Imp Age 
 - Fortifications are built faster
Koreans.techs:
- Panokseon: Gives Turtle Ships +15% movement speed 
 - Shinkichon: (+1) Range for Mangonels & Onagers
Koreans.units:
- War Wagon (Heavily Armored Cavalry Archer) 
 - Turtle Ship (Heavily Armored Warship)

Lithuanians.civBonus:
- Start with +150 food 
 - Spearman-line and Skirmishers cost no wood 
 - Each garrisoned relic gives +1 attack to calvary units (maximun +5)
Lithuanians.techs:
- Hill Forts: Town Center +3 range 
 - Tower Shields: Spearman-line and Skirmishers +1P armor

Magyars.civBonus:
- Villagers can kill wolves with 1 strike 
 - Forging, Iron Casting, Blast Furnace free 
 - Scout Cavalry, Light Cavalry, Hussar cost -15%
Magyars.techs:
- Mercenaries: Magyar Huszar costs no gold 
 - Recurve Bow: Cavalry archers get +1 range, +1 attack

Malay.civBonus:
- Advancing to Ages +80% faster 
 - Fish Traps cost -33% 
 - Fish Traps provide unlimited food 
 - Battle Elephants 25% cheaper
Malay.techs:
- Thalassocracy: Docks are upgraded to Harbors that fire arrows 
 - Forced Levy: Militia Line costs no gold

Malians.civBonus:
- Buildings cost -15% wood 
 - Barracks units +1 pierce armor per age (starting from Feudal Age) 
 - Gold mining upgrades free
Malians.techs:
- Tigui: Town Centers fire arrows (they are able to fire without being garrisoned with villagers/archers) 
 - Farimba: Cavalry +5 attack

Mayans.civBonus:
- Starts with +1 Villager but -50 Food 
 - Resources last 15% longer 
 - Archery Range Units cost -10% Feudal Age, -20% Castle Age, -30% Imp Age 
 - No Gunpowder or Cavalry Units 
 - Scout Cavalry is replaced by Eagle Scout
Mayans.techs:
- Obsidian Arrows: Gives Archers +6 attack against standard buildings and stone defense 
 - El Dorado: +40% HP for Eagle Warriors

Mongols.civBonus:
- Cavalry Archers fire 20% faster 
 - Light Cavalry, Hussar have +30% HP 
 - Hunters work 50% faster
Mongols.techs:
- Nomads: Makes Houses keep their population space if they are destroyed 
 - Drill: Siege Units move 50% faster

Persians.civBonus:
- Start Match with +50 Food and +50 Wood 
 - Town Center, Docks x2 HP, work rate +10% Feudal, +15% Castle, +20% Imp
Persians.techs:
- Boiling Oil: Gives Castles +9 attack against rams 
 - Mahouts: War Elephants move 30% faster
Persians.units: - War Elephant (Slow yet strong and devastating)

Portuguese.civBonus:
- All units cost -15% gold 
 - Ships +10% HP 
 - Can build Feitoria in Imp Age (The Feitoria is a building that requires 20 pop, 250 stone and gold. An economic building, it generates resources without the need of villagers)
Portuguese.techs:
- Carrack: Ships +1/+1 armor 
 - Arquebus: Gunpowder units benefit from Ballistics tech
Portuguese.units:
- Caravel (Warship with 'area of effect' attack) 
 - Organ Gun (Siege engine with area of effect attack)

Saracens.civBonus:
- Market trade cost is 5% of goods (Instead of 30%) 
 - Markets cost -75 wood 
 - Transport Ships have x2 HP & x2 carry capacity 
 - Galleys attack 20% faster 
 - Cavalry Archers have +3 attack against buildings
Saracens.teamBonus: - Foot Archers have +1 Attack against Buildings
Saracens.techs:
- Madrasah: Causes Monks to return 33 gold when they die 
 - Zealotry: Camels, Mamelukes +30 HP

Slavs.civBonus:
- Farmers work 15% faster 
 - Siege Weapons 15% cheaper 
 - Tracking free
Slavs.techs:
- Orthodoxy: Monks extra armor 
 - Druzhina: Infantry damage adjacent units

Spanish.civBonus:
- Builders work 30% faster 
 - Blacksmith upgrades cost no Gold 
 - Cannon galleons benefit from Ballistics (fire faster, more accurately) 
 - Gunpowder units fire 15% faster
Spanish.techs:
- Inquisition: Increases conversion speed for Monks and Missionaries 
 - Supremacy: Increased Attack, Armor and HP for Villagers

Tatars.civBonus:
- Sheep contain +50% food 
 - Units deal +25% damage when fighting from higher elevation 
 - Parthian Tatics free
Tatars.techs:
- Silk Armor: Scout Cavalry-line and Cavalry Archers recieve +1P armor 
 - Timurid Seigecraft: Trebuchets +1 range
Tatars.units: - Keshik (raiding Cavalry that generates gold fighting other units)

Teutons.civBonus:
- Monks have x2 Heal Range 
 - Towers garrison x2 more units 
 - Murder Holes Tech free 
 - Farms cost -33% 
 - Town Centers garrison +10
Teutons.techs:
- Ironclad: Gives siege weapons +4 armor 
 - Crenellations - (+3 range for Castles: garrisoned infantry fire arrows)

Turks.civBonus:
- Gunpowder units have +25% HP 
 - Gunpowder techs cost -50% 
 - Chemistry tech free 
 - Gold miners work 20% faster 
 - Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrade free
Turks.techs:
- Sipahi: Gives Cavalry Archers +20 HP 
 - Artillery: +2 Range for Bombard Towers, Bombard Cannons, and Cannon Galleons

Vietnamese.civBonus:
- Reveals enemy positions at game start 
 - Archery Range Units have +10% HP in Feudal Age, +15% in Castle, and +20% in Imperial (does not stack) 
 - Free Conscription
Vietnamese.teamBonus: - Have access to Imperial Skirmisher Upgrade
Vietnamese.techs:
- Chatras: Battle Elephants get +30 HP 
 - Paper Money: Tributes 500 gold to each ally
Vietnamese.units: - Rattan Archer (Archer with high pierce armor)

Vikings.civBonus:
- Warships cost -15% Feudal Age, -15% Castle Age, -20% Imperial Age 
 - Infantry +10% HP Feudal Age, +15% Castle Age, +20% Imperial Age 
 - Wheelbarrow, Hand Cart techs free
Vikings.techs:
- Chieftains: Gives infantry +5 attack against Cavalry and +4 attack against camels 
 - Berserkergang: Berserks regenerate faster
Vikings.units:
- Berserker (Health Regenerating Infantry) 
 - Longboat (Warship that fire multiple arrows)
